${ModID}:NoxiousBrew.NAME: Noxious Brew
DESCRIPTIONS: Apply {0} #yPoison to a random enemy at the end of your turn.

${ModID}:MushroomSoup.NAME: Mushroom Soup
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain {0} #yTemporary #yHP at the end of your turn.

${ModID}:GremsFire.NAME: Grem's Fire
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal {0} damage to ALL enemies at the end of your turn.
